GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
arm64: select TRACE_IRQFLAGS_NMI_SUPPORT

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit c66b3b49fe03fb2c5fe7e2bc19a7f55e9461d418, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit f0cd5ac1e4c53cb691b3ed3cda1031e1c42153e2. For more details please see the references link.
